com.teamten.chess
Class PieceType

java.lang.Object
  com.teamten.chess.PieceType

public abstract class PieceType
extends java.lang.Object

Represents a type of piece, such as a queen or rook, but not of a particular color.

          Adds to the list the moves possible by this piece at this position on this side on this board.
 char getCharacter()

          Return the offset from 0x2654 for this piece type for white.

Method Detail

getCharacter

public char getCharacter()
Return the character that can be used to represent this piece in ASCII mode, always lower case.

getUnicodeOffset

public int getUnicodeOffset()
Return the offset from 0x2654 for this piece type for white. For example, king is 0 and rook is 2. See http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chess_symbols_in_Unicode

getValue

public int getValue()
Return the piece's value (e.g., 3 for bishop, 9 for queen).

addMoves

public abstract void addMoves(Board board,
                              int index,
                              int side,
                              boolean capturesOnly,
                              java.util.List<Move> moveList)
Adds to the list the moves possible by this piece at this position on this side on this board.
